mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_id as id,m.menu_name as name,m.menu_url as url,m.menu_parent_id as pId from menu m left join role_menu rm on m.menu_id =rm.menu_id left join role r on rm.role_id = r.role_id where r.role_id=#{roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and m.flag = 0;
mapper.update: update menu set flag = 1 where menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
